name: Small Evil
description:
A small game for the Untitled Game Jam 38  where bugs have taken over the world and are forcing humans to fight as gladiators.

The player being a gladiator must go through a series of levels with multiple rounds where they must grab bugs and put them in a bin with a time limit.

Controls:

move = WASD or Arrow keys

Pick up bugs =  hold left mouse and let go to drop them
